### Which party's contact information do you want to change?
 This includes any other attendees linked to the party, such as:
* litigation friends
* experts
* witnesses

 ### Which details do you want to update?

Experts

Please update the contact details of any individual who may attend a hearing as an expert.

Witnesses

Please update the contact details of any individual who may attend a hearing as a witness.

### Do you have a signed order from a judge?
 You can only update the following details if a judge has given their permission to do so.
* First name
* Last name

 You can only update the following details if a judge has given their permission to do so.
* Company name

 You can only update the following details if a judge has given their permission to do so.
* Trading as
* First name
* Last name
